details: Online session on transformational leadership of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj: Ageless learning of all on 10th March, 2021. In this zoom meeting we learned about Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj leadership.

New aspects of women leadership was an online session on zoom conducted on 8th March, 2021. On this women's day we learned about women empowerment. It was organised by Balasaheb Thackeray Adhyasan Kendra.
A 30 hour Self-defense training program for girl students organized by WDC in collaboration with Gymkhana committee. Trainer: Mr. Prasad, HB Sports. Start Date: 8th March 2021.
Online seminar in cooperation with Ocupetal, a digital marketing agency. Speaker: Mr. Punit Shetty. Attended by 26 students and 1 faculty.
Crown making activity on International Women's Day where volunteers created crowns for women they admire.
Hands-on training session on greeting card making for girls. Resource person: Ms. Vaishali Lund.
Financial Literacy session for girl students. Resource Person: Mr. Manohar Puranik.
Online session by the Centre of Disaster Management covering precautions and safety measures.
Lecture on Cyber Safety for students. Resource person: Mr. Sreejith Joshi from BSNL, Kerala.
Maharashtra Nature Park Event: Volunteers made bunches of saplings and planted them between 17th - 23rd February 2021.
Volunteers helped in path building using bricks at Maharashtra Nature Park as part of plantation and jungle pathway development.
Continuation of Maharashtra Nature Park activity involving digging, making bunches and planting saplings.
Street play performed at CSTM Bus Depot to spread awareness on road safety rules and precautions.
Maharashtra Nature Park Event: Bag filling and plantation work done enthusiastically by volunteers.
Two lectures on Gender Sensitization. Resource persons: Ms. Urmila Salunkhe (Akhara Foundation) and Dr. Hema Mehta (Tolani College).
Beach clean-up drive at Dadar Beach in collaboration with Khushiyaan Foundation to support Beach Warriors initiative.
Polio vaccination drive at Sion Kolivada; covered over 730 children with BMC help.
GLC NSS unit conducted a 4-day YouTube session on new labour codes from 28th to 31st January 2021.
Blood donation camp conducted in college quadrangle. 40 volunteers participated.
Street play on blood donation explaining its greatness and life-saving impact.
Financial Wellness session in collaboration with NSE and Board of Industry-Academia Partnerships. Held on MS Teams for BAF, BMS, BSC IT and BCom, BFM, BBI students.
Paper bag making to reduce plastic usage; distributed to nearby retail shops.
Beach cleanup at Dadar Beach in collaboration with Beach Warriors.
Online cornerstone unveiling ceremony. Learned about life and beliefs of Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar.
University webinar on legal aspects related to students and youth movement.
Constitution Day celebration on YouTube with reading of preamble by PM of India.
Beach cleaning activity at Dadar Beach in collaboration with Khushiyaan Foundation (Beach Warriors).
Polio vaccination drive at Sion Kolivada covering over 810 children with BMC's help.
Online session by VCAN on 'Brain Attacks and Strokes'. Speaker: Dr. Anil Karapurkar.
Awareness event with volunteer posters and quotes on women empowerment shared via NSS social media.
Online seminar on mental health issues during COVID period.
Workshop on Online Safety conducted by YOLO in collaboration with Internship Cell. Trainers were Ms. Tanya Tikiya and Mr. Siddharth Kapoor (lawyers).
VCAN online session on heart attacks. Guest speaker: Dr. Dev B. Pahlajani.
Bhajan Sandhya on YouTube organized by Mumbai Vidyapeeth about Mahatma Gandhi.
Online seminar on mental health. Guest speaker: Miss Shruti Soman.
Independence Day pledge video campaign by NSS volunteers from home.
